titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 2-Oxepanone,polymer with 1,4-butanediol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/12/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-Oxepanone,polymer with 1,4-butanediol.
